basic_information.scholarship_name: Finney Scholars Scholarship for Mass Communication

description: This scholarship honors Dr. Frank Finney, Jr. In 1971, he became the first dean of the newly-formed College of Liberal Arts. Dr. Finney was passionate about developing the creative potential of students and giving them a sound background in their academic disciplines. "The Finney" recognizes Liberal Arts students who are identified as having a proven record of high academic achievement in their major. Eligibility Requirements Mass Communication major Minimum 3.5 GPA in chosen major Minimum 3.5 GPA overall Full-time undergraduate or graduate in good standing with the University Shows practical evidence of excellence in the discipline as determined by the department Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
